system.effect:
Trigger: You train your Pokémon
Effect: Your Pokémon of Friendship 4 or higher are able train up to 4 different Trainings during your hour training. You gain additional training when taking this class, you can choose any training ignoring prerequisites. For each training above the 1st, your Pokémon loses one Spirit.
Bonus: When your Pokémon are using Spirit, they can always spend Spirit to -3.
Note: To Clarify, while at 0 or Above, Hustlers can spend Spirit down to -3, all other classes can only spend down to 0 (or -1 for intercepting)
system.prerequisites: Novice Athletics or Acrobatics or Combat
system.name: Enduring Soul
